holidays.name: Global Forgiveness Day
holidays.description: A day dedicated to letting go of grudges, offering forgiveness, and promoting emotional healing worldwide.
holidays.origin: Inspired by psychological research showing the health benefits of forgiveness, this day encourages acts of kindness and reconciliation.
holidays.funFact: Studies have shown that practicing forgiveness can reduce stress and improve cardiovascular health, making this day good for both your heart and soul!

holidays.origin: Unfolded from gaming communities wanting a dedicated day to share their passion and highlight the impact of video games globally.
holidays.funFact: The longest video game marathon lasted 138 hours, proving some gamers really do live in their consoles!
